trans-unit.source: Send cross-platform notifications to users with Notification Hubs (ASP.NET)
trans-unit.target: Send cross-platform notifications to users with Notification Hubs (ASP.NET)

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Notification Hubs templates to send, in a single request, a platform-agnostic notification that targets all platforms.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Notification Hubs templates to send, in a single request, a platform-agnostic notification that targets all platforms.

trans-unit.source: Send cross-platform notifications to users with Notification Hubs
trans-unit.target: Send cross-platform notifications to users with Notification Hubs

trans-unit.source: In the previous tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs], you learned how to push notifications to all devices registered by a specific authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: In the previous tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs], you learned how to push notifications to all devices registered by a specific authenticated user.

trans-unit.source: In that tutorial, multiple requests were required to send a notification to each supported client platform.
trans-unit.target: In that tutorial, multiple requests were required to send a notification to each supported client platform.

trans-unit.source: Notification Hubs supports templates, which let you specify how a specific device wants to receive notifications.
trans-unit.target: Notification Hubs supports templates, which let you specify how a specific device wants to receive notifications.

trans-unit.source: This simplifies sending cross-platform notifications.
trans-unit.target: This simplifies sending cross-platform notifications.

trans-unit.source: This topic demonstrates how to take advantage of templates to send, in a single request, a platform-agnostic notification that targets all platforms.
trans-unit.target: This topic demonstrates how to take advantage of templates to send, in a single request, a platform-agnostic notification that targets all platforms.

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information about templates, see [Azure Notification Hubs Overview][Templates].
trans-unit.target: For more detailed information about templates, see [Azure Notification Hubs Overview][Templates].

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Notification Hubs allows a device to register multiple templates with the same tag.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Notification Hubs allows a device to register multiple templates with the same tag.

trans-unit.source: In this case, an incoming message targeting that tag results in multiple notifications delivered to the device, one for each template.
trans-unit.target: In this case, an incoming message targeting that tag results in multiple notifications delivered to the device, one for each template.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to display the same message in multiple visual notifications, such as both as a badge and as a toast notification in a Windows Store app.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to display the same message in multiple visual notifications, such as both as a badge and as a toast notification in a Windows Store app.

trans-unit.source: Complete the following steps to send cross-platform notifications using templates:
trans-unit.target: Complete the following steps to send cross-platform notifications using templates:

trans-unit.source: In the Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, expand the **Controllers** folder, then open the RegisterController.cs file.
trans-unit.target: In the Solution Explorer in Visual Studio, expand the **Controllers** folder, then open the RegisterController.cs file.

trans-unit.source: Locate the block of code in the **Post** method that creates a new registration replace the `switch` content with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Locate the block of code in the **Post** method that creates a new registration replace the `switch` content with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This code calls the platform-specific method to create a template registration instead of a native registration.
trans-unit.target: This code calls the platform-specific method to create a template registration instead of a native registration.

trans-unit.source: Existing registrations need not be modified because template registrations derive from native registrations.
trans-unit.target: Existing registrations need not be modified because template registrations derive from native registrations.

trans-unit.source: In the **Notifications** controller, replace the **sendNotification** method with the following code:
trans-unit.target: In the **Notifications** controller, replace the **sendNotification** method with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This code sends a notification to all platforms at the same time and without having to specify a native payload.
trans-unit.target: This code sends a notification to all platforms at the same time and without having to specify a native payload.

trans-unit.source: Notification Hubs builds and delivers the correct payload to every device with the provided _tag_ value, as specified in the registered templates.
trans-unit.target: Notification Hubs builds and delivers the correct payload to every device with the provided _tag_ value, as specified in the registered templates.

trans-unit.source: Re-publish your WebApi back-end project.
trans-unit.target: Re-publish your WebApi back-end project.

trans-unit.source: Run the client app again and verify that registration succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Run the client app again and verify that registration succeeds.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Deploy the client app to a second device, then run the app.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) Deploy the client app to a second device, then run the app.

trans-unit.source: Note that a notification is displayed on each device.
trans-unit.target: Note that a notification is displayed on each device.

trans-unit.target: Next Steps
